statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -6 \\ 18 \\ -6 \\ 22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -8 \\ 43 \\ -27 \\ 42 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
